summary: The customer has been experiencing issues with their other product purchased from Contoso Wireless. The product is malfunctioning and shutting off randomly, which is causing major inconvenience for the customer. The customer has already attempted the troubleshooting steps recommended in the user manual, but they have been unsuccessful. The agent has apologized for the customer's dissatisfaction and offered to help make things right. They have asked the customer to provide more information about their other so they can better assist them.
